title: Frontend with insight, not just tools
p1: I didnâ€™t get into programming because it was trendy, but out of conviction and purpose.
p2: After more than 20 years in administration and visual communication, I reinvented myself five years ago as a web developer. Today I combine solid experience with informed decision-making, deliberate and thoughtful in every project.
p3: I listen, understand real needs, and transform them into maintainable digital solutions. I focus on best practices, accessibility, performance, and user experience, staying involved from start to finish.
